forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 20. Northwest wind around 3 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 12. Southwest wind around 5 mph.

weather_report:
As the afternoon sun blankets Boston in a gentle embrace, the city basks in the warmth of a clear sky, inviting an array of moments just waiting to unfold. With pleasant temperatures hovering near twenty degrees, and a light northwest breeze whispering through the streets, today's conditions evoke a sense of calm and clarity seldom found in the chill of winter. The absence of fog allows the skyline to stand proud and resolute against the azure expanse overhead, setting the stage for a remarkable winter afternoon.

As daylight eases into evening, the clouds will gather, bringing a cooler edge to the air with temperatures expected to dip around twelve degrees. It is a time when layers become your best companion; a cozy scarf wrapped snugly around the neck will keep the bite of the evening at bay, complemented by a well-insulated coat. Outdoor strolls alongside the banks of the Charles, perhaps stopping for a warm drink from one of the local cafes, could prove to be the perfect way to savor the lingering daylight and witness the city transition into the evening’s embrace. For the adventurous, this serene weather sets a wonderful backdrop not only for a leisurely bike ride through the copper-tinged parks but also for introspective moments spent contemplating the quiet beauty of this winter afternoon.
